text: Bede Vincent Heather (7 December 1928 - 25 February 2021) was an Australian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1951. He was titular bishop of Obbi and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Sydney, Australia, from 1979 to 1986 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Parramatta from 1986 to 1997. Heather died on 25 February 2021, aged 92.Bede Vincent Heather ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Sydney
title: Bede Vincent Heather
